extendedInfo.description: Our famous Premier League app is back with the second version! It offers now even a more simple and mobile friendly user interface. We have used all your recommendations and our quick and easy to use version is here, including free real-time goal alerts using push notifications!We support the English Premier League (EPL), The Championship (The Football League) and Champions League (UEFA CL).Features:>> Premier League / The Championship / Champions League fixtures - Simply add a selected event into your calendar>> Live Scores including goal-scorers or yellow/red cards>> Free Live Scores notifications â mark your favorite team (Settings) and get GOAL alerts every time the score is changed>> League table including GP (Games played), W (Wins), D (Draws), L (Losses), GF (Goals scored), GA (Goals conceded), GD (Goal difference), Pts (Points). The League table is updated once per 24 hours.>> Results history - We keep track of all previous Premier League results for the season 2012/13>> Odds comparison - Information about betting odds and Visual odds Power graph for all punters. You can easily change the displayed odds type to European (decimal), UK (fractions), US (moneyline), Hong Kong, Indonesian and Malaysian format. >> Fan Photo /  Fan Video Gallery - Share your best moments with other fans >> The most recent articles, tweets and videos>> All English Premier League football clubs information (excellent content is delivered by Wikipedia)>> Fast processing, simple to use and mobile friendly design- No affiliation with any 3rd party content inside this app- No hidden costs or charges- The only commercial element in this app is an AD banner served from time to time by Flurry advertising network.We look forward to hearing your feedback about our Premier League Android app.Contact us at media@sportexplorer.mobi for any kind of cooperation!Best regards,developers

reviews.title: Impressive
reviews.comment: Very good app for football fans.
reviews.author: Benjamin Looi

reviews.title: Best Football app
reviews.comment: This app is essential if you love Epl football! Tried plenty of others but this is by far superior.
reviews.author: Nazier Natha

reviews.title: Notifications
reviews.comment: Great update, goal alerts are quicker than live scores page refresh interval. Nice job guys!
reviews.author: Vlado S.
